item.title: Test Python Code
item.description: Writing unit tests should an integral part of delivering software for every developer. Whenever a piece of code is changed, it has the potential to break all other parts. The broken parts can even be discovered in a far later stage, having caused potential damage that is hard to restore.

item.title: Test Code in Databricks Notebooks
item.description: Companies hire developers to write spark applications – using expensive Databricks clusters – transforming and delivering business-critical data to the end user. It is often the case that the testing part of these spark applications is neglected because Databricks notebooks are intrinsically hard to test, as convenient as they may be.
